results.title: Not the chosen one
results.brief_description: A hand-drawn computer animation tells a story of a lonely man yearning for a lover. As the cold winter months pass into spring, his snowman companion melts into a woman. The man pursues the woman to discover he isn’t the chosen one and then becomes seduced by a frog.
results.description: A hand-drawn computer animation tells a story of a lonely man yearning for a lover. As the cold winter months pass into spring, his snowman companion melts into a woman. The man pursues the woman to discover he isn’t the chosen one and then becomes seduced by a frog.

results.title: Nice day
results.brief_description: A colour hand-drawn animation in response to the theme washing machine depicts an unhappy woman attending her domestic duties. She starts to imagine her husband is up to no good and in her rage is driven to drink.

results.title: Metamorphosis: DJ

results.title: Maya
results.brief_description: Maya is a non-narrative collage of various 2D computer animation styles and images. The layered and merging images are created by a number of methods employing various styles from pixilated hand-drawn images to photographically sourced images of ancient and contemporary Thai culture.

results.title: La Maison des Cochons
results.brief_description: A claymation about an unsuspecting man whose fondness for baby pork is tantalised when he passes a restaurant that specialises in pig dishes. He is charmed and impressed by the service and ambience of the restaurant as he places his order with the waiter. The gruesome truth of the restaurant is soon revealed to the man when his dish arrives.

results.title: The Joker to the thief
results.brief_description: A surreal hand-drawn computer animation of a thief who steals his way into a mediaeval castle. Filled with hallucenogenic imagery the thief is surrounded by magic, scenes of madness and other horrors. He attempts to flee but is followed by the joker equipped with his tricks.

results.title: Gum
results.brief_description: A playful cut-out animation of a man and woman blowing bubbles of gum whilst dancing to music against the starry night and city lights. Their romantic interlude is interrupted when an alien bursts their bubble. Done as a collaboration by Jasmin de Wolf and de Ville.
